title: What is the average kinetic energy of particles in matter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Temperature is the measure of thermal energy in matter. Thermal energy is nothing but kinectic energy present in particles. We can say that, temperature is the average kinetic energy of particles present in a substance.
Average kinetic energy of particles is direcly connected with the temperature as shown in Kinetic Temperature Ek = 3/2*kT
